Package org.jivesoftware.admin

Supporting classes and tags for the admin console.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PluginFilter.SimpleFilter A simplified version of a servlet filter.
 

Class Summary
AdminConsole A model for admin tab and sidebar info.
AdminPageBean A bean to hold page information for the admin console.
AdminPageBean.Breadcrumb A simple model of a breadcrumb.
AuthCheckFilter A simple filter which checks for the auth token in the user's session.
LdapGroupTester Class that assists during the testing of the ldap groups.
LdapGroupTester.Group Representation of a group found in LDAP.
LdapUserProfile Bean that stores the vcard mapping.
LdapUserTester Class that assists during the testing of the user-ldap mapping.
LoginLimitManager Handles recording admin console login attempts and handling temporary lockouts where necessary.
PluginFilter A servlet filter that plugin classes can use to dynamically register and un-register filter logic.
SidebarTag A simple JSP tag for displaying sidebar information in the admin console.
SubnavTag A simple JSP tag for displaying sub-navigation bar information in the admin console.
SubSidebarTag A simple tag to gather its body content and pass it to the parent tag.
TabsTag A simple JSP tag for displaying tab information in the admin console.
 

Package org.jivesoftware.admin Description

Supporting classes and tags for the admin console.
